title: [W]Claimant average weekly work hours
workHourLabel: [W]Average weekly work hours provided on ET1
p1: [W]It may help the tribunal if you can provide these detail. You will not be penalised for not providing it.

areClaimantWorkHourCorrect.label: [W]Are the claimant’s average weekly work hours correct?

whatAreClaimantCorrectWorkHour.label: [W]What are the claimant’s correct average weekly work hours? (optional)
whatAreClaimantCorrectWorkHour.hint: [W]Enter the claimant’s average hours worked each week in digits.

whatAreClaimantCorrectWorkHour.invalid: [W]The average weekly work hours’ entered must be less than 168 hours
whatAreClaimantCorrectWorkHour.exceeded: [W]The average weekly work hours’ entered must be less than 168 hours
